description:
The Swiss Army Knife of PC Gaming

Lovingly referred to as the Swiss Army Knife of PC gaming, Special K does a bit of everything. It is best known for fixing and enhancing graphics, its many detailed performance analysis and correction mods, and a constantly growing palette of tools that solve a wide variety of issues affecting PC games.
Below are the highlights between v 24.11.15.3 - v 24.11.16.3:

 + Added Lossy scRGB->HDR10 Quantization mode to reduce filesize on HDR PNG
     screenshots.
 + Fixed problems with SK not re-initializing D3D11 when the active SwapChain
     is destroyed and re-created.
 + Fixed potential issues with loading ReShade as a plug-in and config files
     not correctly being passed to create_effect_runtime (...).
